Early Mountain has the beauty, stately modern facilities, and luxurious amenities you're looking for for your ceremony and reception. Consider a winery wedding with panoramic views of the Blue Ridge foothills, followed by an intimate sit-down dinner in our beautiful event hall with award-winning wines and world-class cuisine. There is a silver lining to a little rain on your wedding day. A knot that becomes wet is extremely hard to untie ‚Äì therefore, when you ‚Äútie the knot‚Äù on a rainy day, your marriage is supposedly just as hard to unravel! Because of this, rain is known as a sign of good luck. üéä‚Å†
‚Å†
